name: Youjuu Club Custom
overview: Yōjū Club Custom is a simple tile-matching game with a gruesome twist: as the player completes rounds of the game, horrifying beasts come closer to sexually attacking young girls. Each stage corresponds to a rape scene dedicated to a particular girl/beast encounter. There are two main modes in the game: picture-matching and word-matching. Both follow the same principle: the player sees a screen with hidden tiles, and the goal is to uncover them and match identically-looking ones. Each time the player selects a wrong tile, he loses a "life". The difference between the mode is rather self-explanatory: in the word-matching mode, the player matches Chinese characters ("kanji") instead of pictures. Stages and rounds become more difficult as the game advances, with more different pictures/words to match, less "lives" etc.
